definition[0]: someone who does not live permanently in a particular country or area
example[0]: A lot of houses in the area are being bought by non-residents.
definition[1]: someone who is not staying in a particular hotel
example[1]: The hotel restaurant is open to non-residents.
definition[2]: someone who for tax purposes is not considered as living permanently in a particular country
example[2]: real estate bought through offshore companies under a system used by non-residents
